Articles.Content: If anyone has it, please post it here. So we can send them fan-mail. Or other things.
No, that doesn't sound suspicious at all! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, the mother company site of SQUAD has their address under contacts. If it is the same one than SQUAD, the game maker .... not sure ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
In before lock. You can post in the Thanks Squad thread instead of sending fan-mail.

Squad's contact information is [publicly available on their website](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/contact.php). Keep in mind, however, that misusing these channels to harass them (as seems hinted in this thread), will *not* endear them to your cause. 

Also, moved to Kerbal Network.

You guys are so pessimistic. He just wants to send them donuts!

I hope.
Guys.. Squad did a great job with the game. I think it's time they receive some extra goodies of appreciation. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

or robotic ants (Muahahahaha)
